Value: Ikwezi Mining Limited engages in the coal mining and development activities in South Africa. The company holds a 70% interest in the Newcastle project covering an area of 12,182 hectares located in KwaZulu-Natal Province. It also operates the Kliprand Colliery and Emoyeni coal bene?ciation plants located in the Dannhauser, KwaZulu-Natal Province. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Hamilton, Bermuda.
